entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SSE 52 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm except locally 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
